vecHighlight.strDescription: 热爱福木兔服装之人的证明。专门制造的衣箱，可以妥善收纳福木兔的服装。
解锁了诸多营地的证明。其上遍布的伤痕，都有着一一对应的回忆。
称霸狱泉乡最难关任务，接近猎人之极致的证明。描绘着激战霸主之景的折扇。
累计获得10万炎火点数的证明。虽然久经使用，但手感顺滑且充满光泽。
成功击退威胁村庄的异形天彗龙的证明。精美的折扇上描绘着英雄对战神秘红光的风采。
在废神社完成50次任务的证明。神木之枝制成的项链。
累计赚取100万金钱的证明。豪华的真金工艺，使其比看起来更为沉重。
获得了诸多花链的证明。以之装饰房屋，室内会充满馨香。
驾驭过诸多怪物的证明。
获得了诸多外观装备的证明。色彩斑斓，绝不会令观者厌倦。
成功击退风神龙和雷神龙的证明。描绘着百龙夜行的古老画卷上，有岁丰稔添补的两头巨龙。
生产了诸多贵重武器防具的证明。选材讲究，与真品别无二致。

vecUnachieved.strDescription: 完成诸多支线任务的证明。饱含众人谢意的花束。
累计100次派遣随从隐秘队进行任务的证明。
收集到众多猎犬具的证明。想要长久使用，每日的保养必不可少。
为充实茶点店菜单而奋斗的证明。茶点店里热闹的声音仿佛就在耳边。
在冰封群岛完成50次任务的证明。冻结于远古的珍宝。
多次骑乘牙猎犬的证明。经历过漫长旅程，犬鞍的磨损程度非同寻常。
唯有竟狩猎之极者可挑战难关，此为称霸该难关任务者的证明。描绘着鏖战之景的折扇。
完成诸多集会所下位任务的证明。公会赠予的纪念品。
在水没林完成50次任务的证明。埋藏在遗迹深处的秘宝。
在熔岩洞完成50次任务的证明。红色和青色的结晶交相辉映。
在沙原完成50次任务的证明。银白色的珍稀仙人掌戒指。
在1次探索之旅中，狩猎共计5头怪物的证明。

data.strFullDescription:
蓬勃跃动的狩猎本能！
为狩猎掀起全新风潮、无拘无束尽情跃动的动作；可随心所欲四下驰骋的全新原野；以及能带来未知的兴奋与惊喜的全新怪物。
前所未有的狩猎体验正在《MONSTER HUNTER RISE》中等候各位猎人的到来！
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1446780/extras/01_マルチ_full.gif?t=1656665891[/img]

[b]・掀起全新风潮的“翔虫”动作[/b]
“翔虫”会飞向猎人指示的方向，并使用特殊的“铁虫丝”将猎人拉近，让狩猎实现进一步的进化，配合各武器种类充满特色的攻击，诞生全新的狩猎动作！
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1446780/extras/02_翔蟲.gif?t=1656665891[/img]

[b]・操纵怪物的豪迈动作“御龙”[/b]
操纵失控的怪物，使出豪迈的动作！
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1446780/extras/03_操竜.gif?t=1656665891[/img]

[b]・为狩猎提供帮助的随从[/b]
除了老搭档“随从艾露猫”，还有全新的可靠同伴“随从牙猎犬”登场！
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1446780/extras/04_ガルク走り.gif?t=1656665891[/img]

[b]・炎火村的故事[/b]
由于时隔50年的灾祸“百龙夜行”临近，炎火村陷入困境。
主角需以成为顶尖猎人为目标，同时与村庄中的同伴团结一致，共同克服这场可怕的灾祸。

[b]・大量怪物大举侵袭的“百龙夜行”[/b]
百龙夜行，指由多只怪物与统领它们的首领组成“怪物群”向村庄发起的袭击。
整个地图到处都是大型怪物的身影……
[b]
・拥有独特生态的怪物[/b]
除象征本作的怪物“怨虎龙”外，还有拥有独特生态的未知怪物与系列怪物相继登场！
data.strSnippet: 蓬勃跃动的狩猎本能！ 为狩猎掀起全新风潮、无拘无束尽情跃动的动作；可随心所欲四下驰骋的全新原野；以及能带来未知的兴奋与惊喜的全新怪物。 前所未有的狩猎体验正在《MONSTER HUNTER RISE》中等候各位猎人的到来！

[[1446780,[["GC_Award_N_20",{"strName":"炎火村风车","strDescription":"发动疾翔进行移动，累计达到1000次的证明。乘风千里适吾意。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/e932a063396b09a62d08e9f6dda3a0b43d9f9cef.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":44.29999923706055}],["GC_Award_N_38",{"strName":"高级铠甲装饰","strDescription":"生产了诸多贵重武器防具的证明。选材讲究，与真品别无二致。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/6a89b4b7e3aac304456f704207f7ca837346d1a0.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":32.5}],["GC_Award_N_48",{"strName":"御龙高手绘马","strDescription":"驾驭过诸多怪物的证明。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/f953e22f25037033c74858ae269b26a6c94132ac.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":39.5}],["GC_Award_N_32",{"strName":"豪华的钱箱","strDescription":"累计赚取100万金钱的证明。豪华的真金工艺，使其比看起来更为沉重。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/8b4dcd36433002cc0ab4bb43214c93335a372ca7.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":38.70000076293945}],["GC_Award_N_11",{"strName":"优秀猎人之卷【上位】","strDescription":"完成诸多集会所上位任务的证明。公会赠予的纪念品。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/c31999420469412e36a8972d82b3d61d7968a54e.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":5}],["GC_Award_N_08",{"strName":"安宁成就折扇","strDescription":"唯有竟狩猎之极者可挑战难关，此为称霸该难关任务者的证明。描绘着鏖战之景的折扇。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/a04be34a9d2039056707f11b447d6f23f70d2624.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":10.199999809265137}],["GC_Award_N_37",{"strName":"猎犬具保养道具","strDescription":"收集到众多猎犬具的证明。想要长久使用，每日的保养必不可少。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/05c31d6c7e21a327b1127c69aaaf5714ad93aa6f.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":18}],["GC_Award_N_40",{"strName":"花链装饰瓶","strDescription":"获得了诸多花链的证明。以之装饰房屋，室内会充满馨香。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/da25cee523b504520da197dfc66dbd4e8c0a8cbe.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":26.5}],["GC_Award_N_41",{"strName":"达人的黑带","strDescription":"获得了诸多替换技的证明。不仅仅是技艺，身体与精神也久经锻炼的人才会被授予此证。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/4cfdbb385bfc1f45347aca87d6002213f9f8709a.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":2.200000047683716}],["GC_Award_N_43",{"strName":"坚固的锁","strDescription":"收集到诸多摆设和立轴的证明。此锁形制坚牢稳固，可保重要物品不致失窃。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/bc5eee76b76b67925b0ad0f567b0c489ba8241e2.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":2.0999999046325684}],["GC_Award_N_44",{"strName":"福木兔专用衣箱","strDescription":"热爱福木兔服装之人的证明。专门制造的衣箱，可以妥善收纳福木兔的服装。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/07d1446b9152a363da5a10a723f716898d7cedd3.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":31}],["GC_Award_N_04",{"strName":"霸主小太刀","strDescription":"成功击退百龙夜行霸主的证明。化为武器的锐爪上残留的伤痕，讲述着原主波澜壮阔的一生。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/c36c01f2859cca82536d83f328143f5c205c7139.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":61.900001525878906}],["GC_Award_N_05",{"strName":"风神龙击退画卷","strDescription":"成功击退风神龙的证明。授予的这副画卷中，由岁丰稔绘制了退敌始末。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/f011c91fdc3c772cc1d3f1e313b538a7d4ed14b3.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":50.599998474121094}],["GC_Award_N_22",{"strName":"陈旧的扎营套件","strDescription":"解锁了诸多营地的证明。其上遍布的伤痕，都有着一一对应的回忆。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/bcee69f441e1ba5203c71a641925a4b3c2107775.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":22}],["GC_Award_N_02",{"strName":"炎火村护符","strDescription":"成为炎火村猎人的证明。授予此证，愿君平安狩猎。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/01c4593add4173fdfdfcf8e50b6e99438c7895e8.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":90.5999984741211}],["GC_Award_N_03",{"strName":"炎火村宝刀","strDescription":"成功狩猎怨虎龙的证明。村中代代相传的宝刀，是村众指引者的象征。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/6b34be035f7e6fc366e8235d1264fb9e5d1d1ba7.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":53.29999923706055}],["GC_Award_N_06",{"strName":"百龙夜行画卷","strDescription":"成功击退风神龙和雷神龙的证明。描绘着百龙夜行的古老画卷上，有岁丰稔添补的两头巨龙。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/3a0bc706497e1fc333620b4d4127faaf5c820956.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":46.70000076293945}],["GC_Award_N_07",{"strName":"凶星击退折扇","strDescription":"成功击退威胁村庄的异形天彗龙的证明。精美的折扇上描绘着英雄对战神秘红光的风采。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/6af2e7191897f3b0ae5fd801169c868ea24c65ae.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":25.799999237060547}],["GC_Award_N_09",{"strName":"真・安宁成就折扇","strDescription":"称霸狱泉乡最难关任务，接近猎人之极致的证明。描绘着激战霸主之景的折扇。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/618cd9cb41a045d130e39773608f782895df0705.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":8.100000381469727}],["GC_Award_N_10",{"strName":"优秀猎人之卷【下位】","strDescription":"完成诸多集会所下位任务的证明。公会赠予的纪念品。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/976d8b285c228369d28ff49535d1b310d630cdc6.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":9}],["GC_Award_N_13",{"strName":"优秀猎人之卷【斗技】","strDescription":"完成诸多斗技大会任务的证明。公会赠予的纪念品。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/843e1aa8dee6f1377fba8cae9b5ac75c50e61200.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":3.200000047683716}],["GC_Award_N_16",{"strName":"彩水晶杯","strDescription":"在水没林完成50次任务的证明。埋藏在遗迹深处的秘宝。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/4293cb2344e8ccc6bef4857b4770e8507699f106.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":8.100000381469727}],["GC_Award_N_36",{"strName":"随从艾露猫的爱","strDescription":"将各种支援类型的随从艾露猫锻炼至最高等级的证明。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/b4ccf842c47f00e8e17178246ca494ec449a1d4e.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":2.0999999046325684}],["GC_Award_N_26",{"strName":"古老的书签","strDescription":"找到了诸多手记的证明。纹样充满了风情。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/a8f55e86a9b7ad1fd7fa4ae7b543141444910dd9.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":3.5999999046325684}],["GC_Award_N_17",{"strName":"白银仙人掌戒指","strDescription":"在沙原完成50次任务的证明。银白色的珍稀仙人掌戒指。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/33737246fe5a2f3053d3c54b0e721c056ab4f73f.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":6.5}],["GC_Award_N_18",{"strName":"碧赤岩手镯","strDescription":"在熔岩洞完成50次任务的证明。红色和青色的结晶交相辉映。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/e01d0712b7edc6e403259826e5840740073980c4.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":7}],["GC_Award_N_33",{"strName":"陈旧的钱箱","strDescription":"累计获得10万炎火点数的证明。虽然久经使用，但手感顺滑且充满光泽。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/abf00fe245ef361af820f0f2365f36546df16ee7.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":38.70000076293945}]]]]
